mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOUND_DETAIL(company_id, bound_id, unit_price_id, inventory_id, item_code, item_name, tot_amount, detail_state, detail_date, amount, detail_isDelete, description) VALUES (#{company_id}, #{bound_id}, #{unit_price_id}, #{inventory_id}, #{item_code}, #{item_name}, #{tot_amount}, #{detail_state}, #{detail_date}, #{amount}, #{detail_isDelete}, #{description})
